metadata.title: CVE-2023-3738 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to115.0.5790.98 allowed a remote attacker to obfuscate security UI via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
